Maschil<S>4905</S> of David<S>1732</S>; A Prayer<S>8605</S> when he was in the cave<S>4631</S>. I cried<S>2199</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> with my voice<S>6963</S>; with my voice<S>6963</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> did I make my supplication<S>2603</S>. <sup>Maschil: or, A Psalm of David, giving instruction</sup>
I poured out<S>8210</S> my complaint<S>7879</S> before<S>6440</S> him; I shewed<S>5046</S> before<S>6440</S> him my trouble<S>6869</S>.
When my spirit<S>7307</S> was overwhelmed<S>5848</S> within me, then thou knewest<S>3045</S> my path<S>5410</S>. In the way<S>734</S> wherein<S>2098</S> I walked<S>1980</S> have they privily laid<S>2934</S> a snare<S>6341</S> for me.
I looked<S>5027</S> on my right hand<S>3225</S>, and beheld<S>7200</S>, but there was no man that would know<S>5234</S> me: refuge<S>4498</S> failed<S>6</S> me; no man cared<S>1875</S> for my soul<S>5315</S>. <sup>I looked: or, Look on the right hand, and see</sup> <sup>failed: Heb. perished from me</sup> <sup>cared: Heb. sought after</sup>
I cried<S>2199</S> unto thee, O LORD<S>3068</S>: I said<S>559</S>, Thou art my refuge<S>4268</S> and my portion<S>2506</S> in the land<S>776</S> of the living<S>2416</S>.
Attend<S>7181</S> unto my cry<S>7440</S>; for I am brought<S>1809</S> very<S>3966</S> low<S>1809</S>: deliver<S>5337</S> me from my persecutors<S>7291</S>; for they are stronger<S>553</S> than I.
Bring<S>3318</S> my soul<S>5315</S> out of prison<S>4525</S>, that I may praise<S>3034</S> thy name<S>8034</S>: the righteous<S>6662</S> shall compass me about<S>3803</S>; for thou shalt deal bountifully<S>1580</S> with me.
